About Me

I'm a Java software engineer and Android enthusiast with 2+ years of experience interested in software design and development. Like to work with web and mobile technologies, always seek for a new knowledge and curious about new technologies. Big fan of Open Source, GitHub, StackOverflow and Android.

Some of the plans for the future are to make a few open source projects, learn Python and algorithms.
